name: Im The Zombie DEMO PC
description:
Im The Zombie 

The game for phones and also for the computer

A game from a zombie perspective that turns humans into zombies : Survive game

You have woken up to the apocalypse in this survival game. Now it's zombie survival time. The world belongs to the infected now. It's time to turn against the humans and survive the apocalypse. The plague is spreading faster, drive the zombies and take over the colonies.

Zombies who turn humans into zombies to create an army to help them take over the world

The game has many different stages, download the game and enjoy...
